LanguageData.CommandHoverOnDesc: Activate this shuttle's hover mode, allowing it to join a caravan.
LanguageData.CommandHoverOffDesc: Deactivate this shuttle's hover mode, allowing it to be loaded and launched.
LanguageData.MessageShuttleMustBeFullyFueled: Shuttles must be fully fueled to travel to or from orbit.
LanguageData.NeedOpenShuttleBay: Landing shuttles require an unobstructed bay clear of buildings, debris, and landed shuttle-craft. Clear the shuttle bay to prepare for landing.
LanguageData.MessageShuttleOnlyPods: Enemy ship has active engines. Use personal shuttles to directly assault the enemy ship or disable its engines.
LanguageData.MessageShuttleNeedsMoreFuel: Your shuttle must be at least {0}% fueled to reach this site. Bring double this if you intend to return!
LanguageData.MustLaunchFromOrbit: This site can only be reached by a shuttle launched from orbit.
LanguageData.ShuttleCommandLaunchGroupDesc: Take off and fly to opposing ship
LanguageData.ShipInsideAbandonHomeDesc: Abandon your ship, any colonists on it will be lost.
LanguageData.ShipInsideLeaveGraveyardDesc: Leave the wreck to its fate.
LanguageData.ShipInsideToggleShieldsDesc: Activate or deactivate your ship's shields
LanguageData.ShipInsideToggleCloakDesc: Activate or deactivate your ship's cloaking device
LanguageData.ShipInsideShipInfoDesc: Shows ship statistics and readiness for interstellar travel.
LanguageData.ShipInsideRenameDesc: Give this ship a new name
LanguageData.ShipInsideMoveDesc: Move the ship elsewhere on this map
LanguageData.ShipInsideMoveRotNo: Ship has non-rotatable, non-even sided buildings!
LanguageData.ShipInsideMoveFailRCS: Not enough RCS thrusters to move ship, required {0}
LanguageData.ShipInsideMoveFailFuel: Not enough fuel to move ship, required {0} fuel
LanguageData.ShipInsideMoveFailPilot: Ship requires a pilot to move.
LanguageData.ShipInsideToggleEnginesDesc: Engage ship engines to clear hazards.
LanguageData.ShipRebuildDesc: Places blueprints for destroyed buildings on this ship.
LanguageData.ShipCombatRetreatDesc: Try to move away from the enemy ship
LanguageData.ShipCombatStopDesc: Cut power to your ship's engines
LanguageData.ShipCombatMaintainDesc: Maintain distance to the enemy ship
LanguageData.ShipCombatAdvanceDesc: Try to move closer to the enemy ship
LanguageData.ShipCombatEscapeDesc: Flee from battle, leaving behind anyone aboard the enemy ship
LanguageData.ShipTargetEndDesc: Stop targeting your current target with your weapons.
LanguageData.CommandWithdrawShipDesc: Withdraw this ship from the battle
LanguageData.ConfirmWithdrawShipCombat: Withdraw this ship to the graveyard? If you lose or flee, the enemy ship will attack your graveyard.
LanguageData.CommandWithdrawWrecksDesc: Withdraw all wrecks from the battle
LanguageData.CommandWithdrawMoveWrecks: Can not move with wrecks on map!
LanguageData.ConfirmWithdrawWrecksCombat: Withdraw all wrecks to the graveyard? If you lose or flee, the enemy ship will attack your graveyard. If you win, the wrecks can be retrieved with the salvage bay for a minor amount of fuel.
LanguageData.CommandScuttleShipDesc: Launches all escape pods to selected destination on the planet.
LanguageData.CommandScuttleShipPods: Can not abandon ship with pods in transit to/from it!
LanguageData.ShipInsideHoldFireDesc: Stop all connected ship-to-ship weapons from firing on enemy ship
LanguageData.ShipInsideToggleDockDesc: Extend or retract the airlock extender up to 3 tiles away
LanguageData.ShipInsideReturnShipDesc: Move this ship back to your stable orbit
LanguageData.ShipInsideCaptureShipDesc: Move this ship to your map
LanguageData.ShipLaunchFailPawns: Non player pawn found on ship: {0}, takeoff aborted.
LanguageData.ShipMoveFailPawns: Player pawn in {0}, ship move aborted.
LanguageData.ShipMoveWreckCommandDesc: Reposition a wreck on your map
LanguageData.ShipMoveWreckFlipCommandDesc: Reposition and flip a wreck on your map
LanguageData.ShipMoveWreckRotCommandDesc: Reposition and rotate a wreck counter clockwise on your map
LanguageData.ShipSalvageCommandDesc: Retrieve a wreck from target map {0}
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBeamDesc: Retrieve loose, free-floating debris from target map {0}
LanguageData.ShipSalvageStablizeDesc: Stabilize the orbit of {0}. This requires enough salvage bays and will consume fuel in your engines.
LanguageData.ShipSalvageStablizeConfirm: Stabilize the orbit of {0}. This requires enough salvage bays and will consume {1} chemfuel equivalent in your engines.
LanguageData.ShipSalvageDisabled: In ship battle or enemy pawns present!
LanguageData.ShipSalvageAbandonConfirm: Are you sure you want to discard the target?\nEverything connected to or on it will burn up in the atmosphere!
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBridge: Can not move intact ships with the salvage bay, capture or destroy the bridge.
LanguageData.ShipSalvageNoSpace: Not enough space on salvage bay.
LanguageData.ShipClaimWrecksCommandDesc: Claim all wrecks on this map
LanguageData.ShipRemoveWrecksCommandDesc: Remove target wreck from this map
LanguageData.ShipInsideHeatWithPowerDesc: Use power for heating when not enough heat is present in the network.
LanguageData.SoSPurgeHeatDesc: Eject molten silver into space to rapidly lower your ship's stored heat.\n\nThis will cause your shields to drop!
LanguageData.MessageTurretWontFireBecauseNotInShipCom: Warning: Turret will not fire because you are not in ship combat.
LanguageData.CommandExtractShipTorpedoDesc: Unloads the current torpedoes so they can be replaced with different ammunition.
LanguageData.CommandShipOptimalRangeDesc: Enable to only fire on targets within optimal range
LanguageData.CommandShipPointDefenseDesc: Use this turret to intercept incoming torpedoes and shuttles
LanguageData.CommandShipTorpedoAllowedDesc: Toggle to prevent or allow firing of this type of torpedo.
LanguageData.ShipCombatPodDestroyedPlayer: Your shuttle was destroyed by enemy point defense!
LanguageData.ShipCombatPodDestroyedEnemy: Enemy shuttle was destroyed by your point defense!
LanguageData.ShipInsidescanRegionDesc: Reveal an area on the planet's surface.
LanguageData.SoSScanMapDesc: View a single map from orbit
LanguageData.SoSStopScanMapDesc: Stop observing {0}. This will cause the map to de-spawn unless colonists are present.
LanguageData.ShipReactorOverdriveDesc: Increase reactor output, at the cost of increased heat production and fuel consumption.
LanguageData.ShipReactorOverdrive2Desc: Greatly increase reactor output, at the cost of increased heat production and fuel consumption. Increases instability, risking fire and radiation leaks.
LanguageData.ShipReactorOverdrive3Desc: Vastly increase reactor output, at the cost of increased heat production and fuel consumption. Increases instability, risking fire and radiation leaks.
LanguageData.ShipBlueprintFailed: Blueprint placement failed! Area must support heavy construction and be clear of non-owned objects and mountain roof.
LanguageData.ShipBlueprintPlace1Desc: Place ship plating and outer hull blueprints. Construct this before placing ship hull!
LanguageData.ShipBlueprintPlace2Desc: Place ship hull blueprints. Construct this before placing interior blueprints!
LanguageData.ShipBlueprintPlace3Desc: Place ship interior blueprints. Construct frame and hull blueprints before placing these!
LanguageData.SoSSpawnHologramDesc: Assemble a formgel through which this consciousness can affect the world
LanguageData.SoSDespawnHologramDesc: Destroy the formgel controlled by this device. Breeding a new mechanite swarm to replace it will take one day
LanguageData.ShipInsideRenameAIDesc: Give this AI a new name
LanguageData.ShipInsideInstallConsciousnessDesc: Install a consciousness into this device
LanguageData.ShipInsideInstallCoreDesc: Order your colonists to install an AI core in this device
LanguageData.SoSHologramColorDesc: Choose the color for this mind's formgel
LanguageData.SoSHologramDrugDesc: Affect this mind with a simulated version of an organic drug.
LanguageData.SoSHologramRelayDesc: Temporarily transfer a hologram to this location, even across great distances
LanguageData.SoSHologramRelayStopDesc: Return {0} to the hologram's original map
LanguageData.ShipInsideEquipRangedDesc: Equip this hologram with a ranged laser attack
LanguageData.ShipInsideEquipMeleeDesc: Equip this hologram with a blade and an energy shield
LanguageData.ShipInsideResurrectBrainDesc: Use a resurrector mech serum to construct a new body for this consciousness
LanguageData.ArchotechCommandSootheDesc: Perform a psychic soothe on one map (costs {0} field strength)
LanguageData.ArchotechCommandShockDesc: Inflict psychic shock on one pawn (costs {0} field strength)
LanguageData.ArchotechCommandInsanityDesc: Inflict psychic insanity on one pawn (costs {0} field strength)
LanguageData.ArchotechCommandPsylinkDesc: Grant a level of psylink to one pawn (costs {0} field strength)
LanguageData.ArchoAnimalSuddenDeath: By some cosmic event an archo animal appeared for a brief moment only to vanish soon after. Maybe it is a sign of things to come.
LanguageData.ArchoAnimalSporeDeath: Without an Archotech to guide it, {0} has perished.
LanguageData.ArchotechOptimizeMatterDesc: Automatically convert standard hull to archotech hull in a slowly widening radius. This will not affect large structures such as heatsinks or shield generators.
LanguageData.ArchotechSporeGiftParticlesDesc: Automatically accept and convert spore rewards to exotic particles
LanguageData.ArchotechDemandGiftDesc: Demand an immediate gift from your archotech spore. This will result in a stacking -40 mood penalty!
LanguageData.ArchotechSporeEvolveDesc: Evolve your archotech spore into a true archotech, and usher in a new age for this world.\n\nThis will end the game!
LanguageData.SalvageShipCancelDesc: Leave the enemy ship behind without salvaging it. Do not do this if any of your crew are still aboard.
LanguageData.SoSEmergencyJTFarDesc: Use your Johnson-Tanaka drive to immediately reach long range. This costs {0}Wd of energy and will require repairs to the drive.
LanguageData.SoSEmergencyJTNearDesc: Use your Johnson-Tanaka drive to immediately reach close range. This costs {0}Wd of energy and will require repairs to the drive.
LanguageData.ArcholifeChangeSkinDesc: This creature seems able to change shape at will, but only between a few discrete forms.
LanguageData.ShipWallLightDesc: Toggle this ship part's integrated lighting system
LanguageData.ShipWallLightRotateDesc: Rotate this ship part's integrated lighting system
LanguageData.ShipWallLightSunDesc: Toggle a special high-power lighting mode designed for hydroponics bays
LanguageData.ShipWallLightColorDesc: Select a color for this ship part's lighting
LanguageData.ShipWallLightDiscoDesc: Set this light to cycle through the color spectrum
LanguageData.ShipHeatPurgeDesc: Begin venting coolant from heatsinks. All shields, weapons, and cloaks on this heat network will shut down, and heatsinks will vent heat five times as quickly.\n\nThis process depletes coolant and reduces the overall capacity of the heat network, and cannot be canceled once it has begun. Outside of combat, depleted capacity will slowly recover.
LanguageData.ShipHeatPurgeNotEnough: Not enough heat in network for purge
